GK19padnscpu:621: vadaty ayaṃ madhyamalokapālatāṃ parārdhyacūḍāmaṇinā ca maulinā // PNc_4.30
GK19padnscpu:622: anātapatro 'yam atra lakṣyate sitātapatrair iva sarvato vṛtaḥ /

GK19padnscpu:624: priyā iyam ārūḍhaguṇā suvaṃśabhūr na cāntikaṃ cāpalatāsya muñcati /

GK19padnscpu:627: adhas taruṇām amunā vinīyate kṣaṇaṃ mṛgavyopanataḥ pariśramaḥ // PNc_4.33
GK19padnscpu:628: ayaṃ sa na syān navasāhasāṅka ity anaṅgalīlāsu kṛtī bhuvaḥpatiḥ /

GK19padnscpu:630: ayaṃ sa no hāra ivāsya dṛśyate karodare pallavapāṭalatviṣi /
GK19padnscpu:631: itaḥ kim etasya na saikate saḥ kiṃ sitacchado locanagocaraṃ gataḥ //
GK19padnscpu:632: suvarṇapuṅkhe likhitaṃ śilīmukhe tad asya nāmāsti samānam ākṛteḥ /

GK19padnscpu:634: anena ced yogam upaiti daivataḥ phanīndrakanyā śaśineva rohiṇī /

GK19padnscpu:636: vidhātum enām aham eva vā kṣamā mitodarīm aṅkatale 'sya ko vidhiḥ /
GK19padnscpu:637: mamedṛśe yadviṣaye vimatsarāḥ stuvanti sakhyo masṛṇoktisauṣṭhavam //
GK19padnscpu:639: kutūhalākṣiptanimeṣalāsyayā vilokayan mām iva dīrghayā dṛśā // PNc_4.39 //
GK19padnscpu:640: pāṭalāyāḥsamīpagamanam athādhigantuṃ kila tasya patriṇo gatiṃ vanānte katham apy alakṣitām
GK19padnscpu:641: tam abhyagāt sā nṛpatiṃ sacāmarā sarit saphenā nidhim ambhasām iva //
GK19padnscpu:642: samuccaran nūpurasinncitaiḥ padair yathā yathā saṃmukham ājagāma sā /
GK19padnscpu:643: tayāyatākṣyeva tathātatheritā dṛg asya paścād apasāram ādade // PNc_4.41
GK19padnscpu:644: śanais tatas tāṃ savidhopasarpaṇīṃ nirīkṣya hāraṃ pidadhe narādhipaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:645: nijottarīyeṇa sitena mārutaḥ śaraddhaneneva śaśāṅkamaṇḍalam // PNc_4.42 //
GK19padnscpu:647: iti prarohadbahumānamantharo babhūva tasminn avanīpurandaraḥ // PNc_4.43
GK19padnscpu:649: tamiddhamuktābharaṇaṃ bhuvaḥpatiṃ payodhiveleva suvelam āpa sā // PNc_4.44
GK19padnscpu:650: avāpa devaḥ śriyam antikasthayā tayā sa vālavyajanāṅkahastayā /
GK19padnscpu:652: pāṭalākṛtaḥ satkāraḥ vibhinnacūrṇālakabhakti kurvatī vikīrṇacūḍāmaṇicandrikaṃ śiraḥ /
GK19padnscpu:653: athānubhavena nideśiteva sā nanāma māninyavaśā viśāṃpatim // PNc_4.46 //
GK19padnscpu:654: dṛśā narendreṇa nideśite svayaṃ śilātale nātividūravartini /
GK19padnscpu:656: ramāṅgadavākyam tayātidīrghair daśanānupātibhir vikṛṣyamāṇām iva bhūṣaṇāṃśubhiḥ /
GK19padnscpu:657: iti kṣitīśeṅgitavartmadīpikām udīrayām āsa giraṃ ramāṅgadaḥ // PNc_4.48 //
GK19padnscpu:658: anena vindhyādrivihārajanmanā śrameṇa kāmaṃ bhavatī kadarthitā /
GK19padnscpu:661: samunmiṣanti śramavāribindavo natāṅgi lāvaṇyasudhālavās iva // PNc_4.50 //
GK19padnscpu:663: na ghūrṇate khinnalalāṭasaṅginī tavālakaśreṇir iyaṃ manāg api // PNc_4.51
GK19padnscpu:665: atha pravālād api pāṭalacchavir na dūyate niḥśvasitena te 'dharaḥ //
GK19padnscpu:667: tavaiṣa kaṇṭhaḥ kuṭajāvadātayā vilāsamuktālatatayeva bhūṣyate // PNc_4.53
GK19padnscpu:668: idaṃ mahac citram amānuṣaṃ tvayā vigāhyate yad vanam advitīyayā /
GK19padnscpu:669: imāḥ kva vindhyasya bhuvo 'tidurgamāḥ kva rājaveśmābharaṇaṃ bhavādṛśī //
GK19padnscpu:671: bibharṣi kasyedam anena pāṇinā vadāvadhūtendumarīci cāmaram // PNc_4.55 //
GK19padnscpu:672: nṛpasya kasyāpi paricchadāṅganā yadi tvam uccair vibhavo hi ko 'pi sa /
GK19padnscpu:673: marutpatir menakayeva tanvi yas tvayāpi vālavyajanena vījyate // PNc_4.56
GK19padnscpu:674: atha rdhimatyā paravaty asi striyā kayāpi kāsau jagadekasundarī /
GK19padnscpu:675: natabhru yasyāḥ smaracāpayaṣṭayo vidheyatāṃ yānti bhavadvidhā api //
GK19padnscpu:677: marutvato vā ramaṇī ramātha vā kalatram ardhenduvibhūṣaṇasya vā ? //
GK19padnscpu:678: iyaṃ paribhrāntir agendrakandare sakhīva te śaṃsati kāryagauravam /
GK19padnscpu:679: bhavādṛśaḥ śvāpadadūṣite 'nyathā caranty araṇye kim adhīnanītayaḥ //
GK19padnscpu:680: anena khelanmadadantinā vada tvam āgatā caṇḍi kuto duradhvanā /
GK19padnscpu:681: vidhāya viśleṣaviṣādam āvayoḥ svakāryaniṣṭhe kathaya kva yāsyasi ? //
GK19padnscpu:682: nāyakavākyam iti sābhihitā mṛgāyatākṣī samupoḍhapraṇayaṃ yaśobhaṭena /
GK19padnscpu:683: sahasā na jagāda lajjayā nu śramataḥ kiṃ tu nṛpas tu tām avocat //
GK19padnscpu:684: śrāntāsi kautukahṛtena kadarthitāsi praśnair anena vihito na tavopacāraḥ /
GK19padnscpu:685: ātithyam eṣa kurute param aṅgalekhā- saṃvāhanaikacaturo niculānilas te //
GK19padnscpu:686: evaṃ nisargamadhureṇa sudhārasaika- niṣyandinā phaṇivadhūr atha sā hasantī /
GK19padnscpu:687: candrāṃśunā kumudinīva dinoṣmataptā vītaklamā narapater vacasā babhūva //
GK19padnscpu:688: iti śrīmṛgāṅkaguptasūnoḥ parimalāparanāmnaḥ padmaguptasya kṛtau navasāhasāṅkacarite mahākāvye pāṭalādarśanaṃ nāma caturthaḥ sargaḥ
GK19padnscpu:689: pañcamaḥ sargaḥ atha sā vadane navendukānti- smitam aṅke viniveśya cāmaraṃ ca /
GK19padnscpu:690: jagatīpatim evam ā babhāṣe masṛṇaṃ mūrtimatī vidagdhateva // PNc_5.1 //
GK19padnscpu:692: tvayi puṇyavaśena dṛṣtim āpte labhate śarma gataśramo mamātmā /
GK19padnscpu:693: udite hi virocane nalinyā vitamastāmarasaṃ vikāsam eti // PNc_5.2 //
GK19padnscpu:694: atimātram upoḍhasaukumārye vacasi śrotram upeyuṣi tvadīye /
GK19padnscpu:695: jhaṭiti pratibhāsate mamāyaṃ kaṭhinaś candanapallavāvataṃsaḥ // PNc_5.3 //
GK19padnscpu:696: kim ayaṃ mayi saṃbhramo 'yam āstāṃ kim ayaṃ na eva janaḥ paricchadas te /
GK19padnscpu:697: upacāraviśeṣasaṃvidhāne pratipaccandra iva uditas tvam eva // PNc_5.4 //
GK19padnscpu:698: bhavadiṅgitavedinaiva pṛṣṭā yad anenāham upāntavartinā te /
GK19padnscpu:699: kim u tat kathayāmi sammataṃ cet kriyatāṃ me svayam ājñayā prasādaḥ //
GK19padnscpu:700: nāyakanideśaḥ abhidhehi lavaḥ kutūhalasya tvadudantaśravaṇe mamāpi jātaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:701: iti sā vasudhāpater nideśād atha pātālavilāsinī jagāda // PNc_5.6 //
GK19padnscpu:702: bhujaṅgalokavarṇanam sa tava śrutim āpta eva tāvat smaralīlābhavanaṃ bhujaṅgalokaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:703: upayāti yad ekadeśasāmyaṃ na mahī nāpi purī purandarasya // PNc_5.7 //
GK19padnscpu:705: phaṇino 'ruṇakāntibhiḥ śirasthair maṇibhir bālam ivātapaṃ vahanti //
GK19padnscpu:706: anulimpati rodasī yathenduḥ prabhayā māṃ na tathety asūyayeva /
GK19padnscpu:707: paṭu yaḥ pramādāvilāsahāsa- stabakair induparamparāḥ prasūte // PNc_5.9 //
GK19padnscpu:709: parito nicitāḥ sadaiva yasmin kakubhas tārikā ivāvabhānti // PNc_5.10 //
GK19padnscpu:710: pratibhāti dadhan phaṇākalāpe pṛthivīṃ yatra saḥ śeṣanāgarājaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:711: nabhaso nipatañ javena bhittvā jagatīṃ gāṅga iva cyutaḥ pravāhaḥ //
GK19padnscpu:712: bhogavatīvarṇanam viditā khalu vāsukes trilokyāṃ harakaṇṭhābharaṇasya bhogibhartuḥ /
GK19padnscpu:713: lalitādbhutabhūmir asti tasmin nagarī bhogavatīti rājadhānī // PNc_5.12 //
GK19padnscpu:715: ṛtavo 'py akhilāḥ sametya yatra smarasāmrājyamahādhuraṃ vahanti //
GK19padnscpu:716: anupādhir upāhṛto vikāsaḥ kamalair yatra vilāsadīrghikāsu /

GK19padnscpu:718: abhikān abhisartum udyataḥ san sapadi vyālavilāsinīsamūhaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:719: bhavati svaphaṇāmaṇipradīpe timirotsāriṇi yatra sābhyasūyaḥ // PNc_5.15 //
GK19padnscpu:721: saritaḥ śriyam īrṣyayeva tasyāḥ suvate mauktikam eva yat payāṃsi //
GK19padnscpu:723: vidadhāti sadaiva yatra yūnāṃ padam aṅke vanitā ca vallakī ca // PNc_5.17
GK19padnscpu:724: śataśo vilasanty udaṃśuratna- stabakāḥ kalpalatā yad aṅgaṇeṣu /

GK19padnscpu:726: api dattakutūhalāḥ surāṇām api vāñcchāpadam ekapiṅgalasya /

GK19padnscpu:728: vasati svayam eva yatra devaḥ sadā kalpitahāṭakeśvarākhyaḥ /

GK19padnscpu:731: śaṅkhapālavarṇanam nijavaṃśaviśeṣako 'sti tasyām uragāṇām adhipaḥ saḥ śaṅkhapālaḥ /

GK19padnscpu:740: nikhilāsu gatā paraṃ prakarṣaṃ śitadhīḥ śaiśavas eva yā kalāsu // PNc_5.25
GK19padnscpu:742: viharaty apacīyamānabālyā haraśaile malaye himālaye ca // PNc_5.26 //
GK19padnscpu:744: kvacid apy agamat palāyya tasyāś capalaḥ kelimṛgo mṛgāyatākṣyāḥ //
GK19padnscpu:745: ativatsalayā samaṃ sakhībhir vipine taṃ paritas tayā vicitya /
GK19padnscpu:746: puline saritaḥ śaśāṅkasūteḥ śramavatyeyam anīyata triyāmā // PNc_5.28 //
GK19padnscpu:748: nikaṣā niculapravālaśayyāṃ tam atha prekṣitavaty āptanidram // PNc_5.29 //
GK19padnscpu:749: tapanīyaśilīmukhas tadaṅge cakitaṃ citrarucau tayā ca dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:750: jalade lalitendracāpabhaktau ahimāṃśor iva bhāsuro mayūkhaḥ // PNc_5.30 //
GK19padnscpu:751: aravindadalatviṣā kareṇa svayam utpāṭya sakautukaṃ gṛhīte /
GK19padnscpu:752: avalokitam etayātha tasmin vijayāṅke navasāhasāṅkanāma // PNc_5.31 //
GK19padnscpu:753: aviśan naranātha nāma pūrvaṃ hṛdaye 'syāḥ sahasātha puṣpaketuḥ /
GK19padnscpu:754: amṛtāṃśumarīciluptanidre labhate yat kumude 'ntaraṃ dvirephaḥ // PNc_5.32
GK19padnscpu:756: paritaḥ śramavāribindavo ye nirapīyanta payodhaśuktiyūthaiḥ // PNc_5.33 //
GK19padnscpu:757: prakṛtiḥ kila yasya te parītā pariṇāmena tadantare 'tra haṃsaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:758: śayanāntagataṃ mṛṇālaśaṅki shṛtavān hāram adhīralocanāyāḥ // PNc_5.34 //
GK19padnscpu:760: udaḍīyata khe mukhena bibhrad bhujagendrapratimaṃ tam añjasā sa /
GK19padnscpu:762: sa ca vindhyavanāntarājim etām aviśan mārutapītapadmagandhām /
GK19padnscpu:765: atha haṃsam itas tato vicetuṃ vijane nāgavadhūjanaḥ pravṛttaḥ // PNc_5.37
GK19padnscpu:767: gahanāsv api tadgaveṣaṇāyai vanalekhāsu mama tvayaṃ prayatnaḥ // PNc_5.38
GK19padnscpu:768: sa mayā na taṭeṣu nirjharāṇāṃ sarasāṃ nāpsu na puṇḍarīkaṣaṇḍe /
GK19padnscpu:769: sarasīṣv api nāyatormilekhā ntarapāriplavasārasāsu dṛṣṭaḥ // PNc_5.39 //
GK19padnscpu:771: avadhāraya pāṭaleti nāmnā tanayāṃ mām uragasya hemanāmnaḥ // PNc_5.40 //
GK19padnscpu:772: acale vicayaḥ patatriṇo 'yaṃ phalitaḥ sādhu mamāhitaśramo 'pi /
GK19padnscpu:773: yad itaḥ puruṣottamo 'si dṛṣṭo vanamadhye nibiḍaśriyopagūḍhaḥ // PNc_5.41
GK19padnscpu:774: uparodham imaṃ na manyase ced yadi vāsmāsu tavāsti pakṣapātaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:775: vada tac caratā kvacid vane 'smin saḥ sahāro vihagas tvayā nu dṛṣṭaḥ //
GK19padnscpu:776: na sa dṛṣṭim itas tavāpi manye tad ahaṃ tadvicayād ito nivarte /
GK19padnscpu:777: nanu tāmyati kāmam āttacintā cirayantyāṃ mayi sāhirājakanyā // PNc_5.43 //
GK19padnscpu:778: atha vā mṛgabhaṅginopanīte vidhinā sā navasāhasāṅkabāṇe /
GK19padnscpu:779: praṇayārpitalocanā sanāmany adhunāpy ālikhiteva nūnam āste // PNc_5.44 //
GK19padnscpu:780: puno 'pi pāṭaloktiḥ iti sā samudīrya tatpṛṣatkān avalokyaiva punaś camatkṛtā iva /
GK19padnscpu:782: so nṛlokaśaśī tvam eva manye mṛgayābaddharuciḥ sa yatpṛṣatkaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:783: bhuvanābhayadāyinām amīṣāṃ bhavataḥ saṃvadatīva sāyakānām // PNc_5.46 //
GK19padnscpu:784: sthitam etad ayomukheṣv amīṣu sphutavarṇaṃ tava nāmadheyalakṣma /
GK19padnscpu:785: avanītilaka tvayi prarūḍhaṃ mama sandehalavaṃ balāt pramārṣṭi // PNc_5.47
GK19padnscpu:786: samupaiti sanāthatāṃ kim anyat tritayena tritayaṃ narendracandra /
GK19padnscpu:787: tridivaṃ namucidviṣā tvayeyaṃ vasudhā vāsukinā rasātalaṃ ca // PNc_5.48 //
GK19padnscpu:788: sanaye nṛpatāv akhaṇḍitājñe tvayi śāsaty avanīṃ dilīpakalpe /
GK19padnscpu:789: vidadhīta padaṃ sudurnaye kas tam ṛte hāramalimlucaṃ vihaṅgam // PNc_5.49
GK19padnscpu:790: asatām asuhṛn na lajjate 'yaṃ kim iti jyākiṇalāñchito bhujas te /
GK19padnscpu:791: avanau yad anena rakṣitāyāṃ vayam asyāṃ mūṣitāḥ patatriṇāpi // PNc_5.50 //
GK19padnscpu:792: apayātu khagaḥ sas tena kṛtyaṃ na hi me hāram iha tvam eva yācyaḥ /
GK19padnscpu:793: na diśanti kim atra coraluptaṃ bata ṣaṣṭāṃśabhujo vasundharāyāḥ //
GK19padnscpu:794: pathi ced avatiṣṭhase praṇīte manunā nātha tad arpyatāṃ sa hāraḥ /
GK19padnscpu:795: na narendra bhavādṛśāḥ kadācit padavīṃ nyāyavidāṃ vilaṅghayanti //
GK19padnscpu:796: nijam arthayase śilīmukhaṃ ced bhavatā yatnavatāpi kiṃ na labhyaḥ? /
GK19padnscpu:797: tvam anāgasi yac chaśiprabhāyāḥ praharan kelimṛge kṛtavyālīkaḥ // PNc_5.53
GK19padnscpu:798: atha vā mṛgayiṣyate na hāraṃ viśikhaṃ dāsyati coragendrakanyā /
GK19padnscpu:799: tvayi netrapathātithitvam āpte sulabho 'syā hi mahājanoparodhaḥ //
GK19padnscpu:801: vahati praṇayoparuddhakūlā kalahaṃsair amum antareṇa revā // PNc_5.55 //
GK19padnscpu:804: tad itaḥ svayam eva deva gatvā pulinaṃ somabhuvas taraṅgavatyāḥ /
GK19padnscpu:805: khagaluptavibhūṣaṇaṃ kṣitau te phaṇirājendrasutāṃ vibodhayehi // PNc_5.57
GK19padnscpu:807: so nṛpaḥ kam api pramodam āpat ghanarājidhvanineva nīlakaṇṭhaḥ // PNc_5.58
GK19padnscpu:808: avadac ca vihasya pārthivendraḥ phaṇirājendrasutāvilāsinīṃ tām /
GK19padnscpu:810: api nāma mṛdūni vetsi vaktuṃ nipunaṃ nyāyam anujjhatī vacāṃsi /
GK19padnscpu:811: prasabhaṃ vihitās tvayā yad ete vayam ātmaskhalite 'pi sāparādhāḥ //
GK19padnscpu:812: idam om iti gṛhyate vacas te saha medhāvini kas tvayā vivādaḥ /
